about_the_game:
Win the acquittal! Easy-to-play rogue light card battle game!

Buzz or Die" is a death game show where only the death row inmate who earns more viewership and popularity through performance will survive. The winner gets acquittal and money, while the loser is deprived of all rights and death awaits him or her.

The battle scenes are based on communication. The system is intuitive and enjoyable without knowing complicated rules, such as more followers increase defense and more anti-followers increase attack power.
Character endings are depicted with rich differentials, including exclusive execution movies that condense the characters' lives. Become a unique death row inmate and kick your rivals to the curb to survive!

You are mortal anyway, what do you care how you use them?
